name: Bowly World Demo
description:
This is a demo of a game I will soon release called Bowly World. A story has not been deiced yet: however, I have ideas. The demo is the first level of the game. The fully released game will be $5 so I decided to make a demo for anyone interested.

The controls are:

Space to jump

left and right arrow keys to move.

on the title screen, press space to begin the game.

Enjoy! :)
